column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Malnati's was my first exposure to Chicago style "pizza" and I really wanted to love it
column2: but if fell kind of short for me. The flavors were ok
column3: but nothing special. The feel felt very much like a chain to me and not a long time city institution which was a bit disappointing. Price was pretty high for pizza
column4: but the slices are really hefty
column5: so a medium should feed 4 pretty easily.
